mapper.update: update ht_account set bank_balance = IFNULL(bank_balance,0) + #{bankBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bank_await = IFNULL(bank_await,0) - #{bankAwait,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bank_await_interest = IFNULL(bank_await_interest,0) - #{bankAwaitInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bank_balance_cash = IFNULL(bank_balance_cash,0) + #{bankBalanceCash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bank_interest_sum = IFNULL(bank_interest_sum,0) + #{bankInterestSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
